type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Packet

---



[Meta Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/packet)

Executes an action on a specified side, opposite to the one which the action is ran on.

Type ID: `apugli:packet`




---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Packet

---



[Meta Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/packet)

Executes an action on a specified side, opposite to the one which the action is ran on.

Type ID: `apugli:packet`




---

side.description: Determines the side at which the packet will be sent to. Accepts either `"client"` or `"server"`
side.markdownDescription: Determines the side at which the packet will be sent to. Accepts either `"client"` or `"server"`
